#define GetBit ( alpha,
i   ) 

Value:

((((unsigned long) (alpha) >> (unsigned long) \
  (i)) & 0x01) != 0)

#define GreaterThanEqualOperator   0xf8

#define ImplodeImageTag   "Implode/Image"

#define RecolorImageTag   "Recolor/Image"

#define RightShiftOperator   0xf6

#define SepiaToneImageTag   "SepiaTone/Image"

#define SetBit ( alpha,
i,
set   ) 

Value:

(alpha)=(Quantum) ((set) ? (unsigned long) (alpha) \
  | (1UL << (unsigned long) (i)) : (unsigned long) (alpha) & \
  ~(1UL << (unsigned long) (i)))
